description: Retention of two air conditioning units to ground floor front elevation
decision_conditions:
<p>Within 6 months of the date of this planning approval, details shall be submitted to and approved in writing by
the Local Planning authority that demonstrate a test has been carried out in accordance with BS4142:2014:
Methods for rating and assessing industrial and commercial sound to show that the total noise level from fixed
plants shall be 10 dB(A) or more below the measured LA90 level at the nearest noise sensitive premises at any
time. The equipment shall thereafter be retained and maintained to ensure the the total noise level shall be
10dB(A) or more below the measured LA90 level at the nearest noise sensitive premises at any time.
</p><p>REASON: To protect the amenity of the neighbouring properties.<br></p>

<p><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;Detailed drawings showing the following modification(s) to the scheme shall be submitted to and approved by the Council before any work is commenced on site:     This part of the development shall be completed only in accordance with the modification(s) thus approved.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:15299,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0},&quot;4&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:16776960},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;10&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;12&quot;:0,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;16&quot;:12}" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial;">Detailed drawings showing the following modification(s) to the scheme shall be submitted to and approved by the Council. This part of the development shall be completed only in accordance with the modification(s) thus approved.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;Detailed drawings showing the following modification(s) to the scheme shall be submitted to and approved by the Council before any work is commenced on site:     This part of the development shall be completed only in accordance with the modification(s) thus approved.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:15299,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0},&quot;4&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:16776960},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;10&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;12&quot;:0,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;16&quot;:12}" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial;">Relocate the top air conditioning unit to ground floor and below the bay window&nbsp;<br></span><br></p>
